changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug qui dans certain cas: Fixed a bug which in certain cases could cause duplicate events to occur
changelog.md.Workarround pour corrigé le bug de la lu: Workaround to correct the brightness bug when switching on Hue apiv2
changelog.md.Reprise de la luminosité précedente lors: Resumption of the previous brightness during an on
changelog.md.Ajout des transistions sur les zones, pi: Added transitions to grouped zones, rooms and lights
changelog.md.plus besoin d'avoir une configuration po: no need to have a configuration so that your lamp has the right controls, everything comes from the bridge
changelog.md.pour ceux qui ont des prises il est poss: for those who have sockets it is possible that you have a synchronization error, you must therefore delete the status command on the sockets and restart the synchronization
changelog.md.Ajout d'illustrations produits HUE (LTV0: Added HUE product illustrations (LTV001, LTA011, LTA009, 5047431P6, 929003479601
changelog.md.Réécriture complete du plugin pour utili: Complete rewrite of the plugin to use the hue 2.0 api
changelog.md.Pour les capteurs les commandes changent: For the sensors the commands change completely so you have to review your scenarios
changelog.md.certaine commandes ne seront plus dispon: certain commands will no longer be available with this new version, including alerts, the rainbow and animations
changelog.md.Les scenes sont maintenant de type actio: Scenes are now of type action other, so there is a command not scene
changelog.md.Seul le pont v2 est compatible, si vous: Only the v2 bridge is compatible, if you are on the v1 bridge then you should definitely not update because Philips Hue has not ported the v2 API to the v1 bridge
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur la decouverte: Fixed a problem with the discovery of scenes on the 2nd Hue bridge
changelog.md.Ajout du Hue White Bulb A67 E27 1600lm: Addition of the Hue White Bulb A67 E27 1600lm
changelog.md.Ajout du smart plug (on\/off seulement p: Addition of the smart plug (on / off only no status feedback for the moment
changelog.md.Correction d'un défaut de surcharge CPU: Correction of a CPU overload fault when deactivating a sensor (the daemon must be restarted following the update to apply the correction
changelog.md.Prise en charge de plusieurs ponts (2 po: Support for multiple bridges (2 at the moment
changelog.md.Ajout d'une commande pour savoir si l'am: Addition of an order to know if the bulb is reachable or not
changelog.md.Correction de la remise à 0 de l'état de: Correction of resetting the lamp state to 0 when it is turned back on
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton pour supprimer une com: Add a button to delete an order
changelog.md.Correction des configurations pour les a: Correction of the configurations for the Ikea bulbs (be careful, they must be removed from jeedom and redo a synchronization
changelog.md.Prise en charge du retour d'état des pri: Support for status feedback from OSRAM SMART sockets (attention requires a new inclusion
changelog.md.Ajout d'un bouton de synchronisation sur: Add a synchronization button on the equipment management page
changelog.md.Ajout de configuration de lumières génér: Added configuration of generic color and non-color lights
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'état des bouto: Correction of a bug on the state of the buttons when restarting the bridge
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur l'inversion de p: Correction of a bug on the presence inversion for the motion sensor (for those already created, it will be necessary to check the inversion box on the line of the Presence command
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le statut des pi: Fixed a bug on the status of parts (on / off) if there is no colored lamp in it
changelog.md.Correction de l'heure des valeurs des ca: Correction of the time of the sensor values
changelog.md.Passage sur le nouveau système de docume: Switch to the new documentation system
changelog.md.Ajout du modèle TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400l: Addition of the TRADFRI bulb GU10 W 400lm model
changelog.md.Ajout d'animations lever et coucher de s: Addition of sunrise and sunset animations (be careful all

index.md.Ce plugin va vous permettre d'intégrer v: This plugin will allow you to integrate your Philips Hue ecosystem into Jeedom
index.md.La plugin offre la possibilité de pilote: The plugin offers the possibility to drive up to 2 Philips Hue bridges simultaneously
index.md.Comme tout plugin Jeedom, le plugin: Like any Jeedom plugin, the plugin
index.md.Une fois le plugin activé, il faudra ren: Once the plugin is activated, you will need to enter the IP address at which your Philips Hue bridge can be reached
index.md.Normalement le plugin devrait vous deman: Normally the plugin should ask you to press the bridge button during the first synchronization
index.md.Vous pouvez renseigner jusqu'à 2 ponts P: You can enter up to 2 Philips Hue bridges that will be able to communicate with Jeedom simultaneously
index.md.utilise son propre démon afin de rester: uses its own daemon in order to stay in constant contact with the Philips Hue bridge (s)
index.md.Vous pouvez en contrôler le statut sur l: You can check the status on the plugin configuration page
index.md.Tous les modules compatible avec le pont: All modules compatible with the Hue bridge are compatible with the Jeedom plugin
index.md.Commande un peu particulière qui est con: A little peculiar command that is designed to be used in a scenario
index.md.Elle permet de définir la durée en secon: It allows to define the duration in seconds of the transition between the current state and the next command
index.md.Par exemple le matin vous pouvez vouloir: For example in the morning you may want to simulate the sunrise in 3 minutes
index.md.Dans votre scénario vous avez donc juste: In your scenario you just have to call the transition command with
index.md.en paramètre puis appeler la commande co: in parameter then call the color command to the desired color
